A young boy discovers a hidden underground city, where the inhabitants have adapted to living without gravity.
A group of astronauts on a mission to a distant planet experience gravity-less environments, leading them to question the nature of reality.
A group of friends go on a camping trip and find themselves in a gravity-free zone, where they must learn to adapt to their new environment.
A group of people are transported to a parallel universe where gravity does not exist, leading them to explore new ways of living and interacting with their surroundings.
A young girl discovers a magical device that can manipulate gravity, leading her on an adventure to save her world from destruction.
